html: Thank you 1D family for helping us celebrate #8YearsofOneDirection we hope you enjoyed reliving some of the amazing memories!pic.twitter.com/BOVPIHnHWS
text: Thank you 1D family for helping us celebrate #8YearsofOneDirection we hope you enjoyed reliving some of the amazing memories!pic.twitter.com/BOVPIHnHWS

html: Wow, Eight years has passed. Thank you for all the love, thank you for all the support. Thank you for everything. I love you. H
text:
Wow, Eight years has passed. Thank you for all the love, thank you for all the support. Thank you for everything. 
I love you. H

html: And now I'm one step closer to being two steps far from you, when everybody wants you, everybody wants you #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
And now I'm one step closer to being two steps far from you, when everybody wants you, everybody wants you 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: You can't go to bed without a cup of tea, maybe that's the reason that you talk in your sleep #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
You can't go to bed without a cup of tea, maybe that's the reason that you talk in your sleep 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: We can make it 'til the end, nothing can come between you and I #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
We can make it 'til the end, nothing can come between you and I 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: And if you like midnight driving with the windows down, and if you like going places we can't even pronounce #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
And if you like midnight driving with the windows down, and if you like going places we can't even pronounce 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: Everybody wanna steal my girl, everybody wanna take her heart away #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
Everybody wanna steal my girl, everybody wanna take her heart away 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: I've been thinking about it lately, does it ever drive you crazy, just how fast the night changes? #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
I've been thinking about it lately, does it ever drive you crazy, just how fast the night changes? 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: I know we only met but let's pretend it's love and never, never, never stop for anyone #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
I know we only met but let's pretend it's love and never, never, never stop for anyone 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: Baby, say yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah yeah and let me kiss you! #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
Baby, say yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah yeah and let me kiss you! 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: #8YearsfOneDirection Wow! 8 years of amazing memories with the lads . Thank you so much for standing by us for all this time.
text: #8YearsfOneDirection Wow! 8 years of amazing memories with the lads . Thank you so much for standing by us for all this time.

html: #8YearsOfOneDirection what an incredible 8 years it’s been with my brothers! Thank you to all the fans that are still supporting and following our journeys. Love LP
text: #8YearsOfOneDirection what an incredible 8 years it’s been with my brothers! Thank you to all the fans that are still supporting and following our journeys. Love LP

html: But now we're together we're alone, and there's no other place I'd ever wanna go #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
But now we're together we're alone, and there's no other place I'd ever wanna go 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: The story of my life, I take her home, I drive all night to keep her warm #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
The story of my life, I take her home, I drive all night to keep her warm 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: Baby you light up my world like nobody else #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
Baby you light up my world like nobody else 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: I wanna love like you made me feel when we were 18 #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
I wanna love like you made me feel when we were 18 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: #8YearsOfOneDirection Where has the time gone!? Thank you so much to every single person who’s ever supported us. Big love!
text: #8YearsOfOneDirection Where has the time gone!? Thank you so much to every single person who’s ever supported us. Big love!

html: I'm half a man at best, with half an arrow in my chest #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
I'm half a man at best, with half an arrow in my chest 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: In the heat where you lay, I could stay right here and burn in it all day #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
In the heat where you lay, I could stay right here and burn in it all day 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: If I didn't have you I'd never see the sun, you taught me how to be someone #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
If I didn't have you I'd never see the sun, you taught me how to be someone 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: We knew every line now I can't remember, how it goes but I know that I won't forget her #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
We knew every line now I can't remember, how it goes but I know that I won't forget her 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: Baby they don't know about, they don't know about us #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
Baby they don't know about, they don't know about us 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: So get out, get out, get out of my head, and fall in to my arms instead #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
So get out, get out, get out of my head, and fall in to my arms instead 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: For your eyes only, I show you my heart, for when you're lonely and forget who you are #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
For your eyes only, I show you my heart, for when you're lonely and forget who you are 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: So I built you a house from a broken home and I wrote you a song with the words you spoke #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
So I built you a house from a broken home and I wrote you a song with the words you spoke 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: It's gotta be you, only you. It's gotta be you, only you #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
It's gotta be you, only you. It's gotta be you, only you 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: Baby you and me, stumbling in the street, singing, singing, singing, singing! #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
Baby you and me, stumbling in the street, singing, singing, singing, singing! 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: And as you close your eyes tonight, I pray that you will see the light, that's shining from the stars above #8YearsofOneDirection
text:
And as you close your eyes tonight, I pray that you will see the light, that's shining from the stars above 

#8YearsofOneDirection

html: You and me got a whole lot of history, we could be the greatest team that the world has ever seen! #8YearsofOneDirection
text:

#8YearsofOneDirection
